trans-unit.source: Supports the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform data operations with business and data objects.
trans-unit.target: 支援<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>控制項，並提供執行資料操作與商務和資料物件的資料繫結控制項的介面。

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceView class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code.
trans-unit.target: ObjectDataSourceView 類別主要被為了用於資料繫結控制項，而不是網頁程式碼中的可程式化物件。

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceView class implements the data functionality for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, including the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Update%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Insert%2A> operations, sorting, filtering, and management of settings kept in view state.
trans-unit.target: ObjectDataSourceView 類別實作的資料功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Update%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Insert%2A>作業、 排序、 篩選和設定的管理檢視中保留狀態。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Update%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: A ObjectDataSourceView object is created for each instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> class at run time.
trans-unit.target: 每個執行個體建立 ObjectDataSourceView 物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>在執行階段類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Calls to data operations of the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> class are handled by the instance of the ObjectDataSourceView object.
trans-unit.target: 資料作業的執行個體的呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>類別會由 ObjectDataSourceView 物件的執行個體。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Page developers do not access the instance of the ObjectDataSourceView class directly.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員不直接存取 ObjectDataSourceView 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Control developers can create custom data controls by extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> and ObjectDataSourceView classes.
trans-unit.target: 控制項開發人員可以建立自訂資料控制項擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>和 ObjectDataSourceView 類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceView class performs data operations by calling methods on business or data objects using reflection.
trans-unit.target: ObjectDataSourceView 類別使用反映的商務或資料物件上呼叫方法，以執行資料作業。

trans-unit.source: At run time, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control creates an instance of the type that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.TypeName%2A> property, and then calls the appropriate method for the data operation.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制建立類型所識別的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.TypeName%2A>屬性，然後呼叫適當的方法，對於資料作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.TypeName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The instantiated object is not cached in memory by the ObjectDataSourceView.
trans-unit.target: 具現化的物件不會快取記憶體的 ObjectDataSourceView。

trans-unit.source: The object is created and destroyed for every data method call.
trans-unit.target: 建立物件，並針對每個資料方法呼叫中終結。

trans-unit.source: If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), an instance is not created but the data operation method is still called.
trans-unit.target: 如果該方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，不會建立執行個體，但仍會呼叫資料作業方法。

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceView is not directly exposed to page developers by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: ObjectDataSourceView 並未直接公開網頁開發人員所<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the properties and methods of the ObjectDataSourceView are accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>存取的屬性和方法的 ObjectDataSourceView

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> of ObjectDataSourceView property is set by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: 例如， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>ObjectDataSourceView 的屬性由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>屬性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>設定</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: Retrieving Data The most basic operation that a data source view performs is data retrieval from the underlying data storage using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> method, which retrieves an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection of data items.
trans-unit.target: 擷取資料的資料來源檢視執行的最基本作業是從基礎資料存放區使用的資料擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法，擷取<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>資料項目的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following data retrieval methods, properties, and events are implemented by the ObjectDataSourceView object and exposed directly by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control to page developers and other callers: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> property - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting> event - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected> event ## Updating Data The ObjectDataSourceView object supports data updates by calling a business or data object method that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列資料擷取方法、 屬性和事件 ObjectDataSourceView 物件實作與直接以公開其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>網頁開發人員和其他呼叫端的控制項:-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>屬性-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>屬性- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>」 事件-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>事件 # # 更新資料 ObjectDataSourceView 物件支援的資料更新，藉由呼叫商務或資料物件的方法，由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateMethod%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls that automatically perform updates, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controls, pass their parameters in an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface to the ObjectDataSourceView and the view object merges these parameters with any parameters that are found in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項的自動更新，這類執行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項，將它們的參數中<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>ObjectDataSourceView 並檢視物件的介面會合併這些參數中所找到的任何參數與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateParameters%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateParameters%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following update methods, properties, and events are implemented by the ObjectDataSourceView and exposed directly by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control to page developers and other callers: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A> method - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A> property - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> property - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating> event - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated> event ## Inserting Data The ObjectDataSourceView object supports inserting new rows of data by calling a business or data object method that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 由 ObjectDataSourceView 實作和公開直接以下列更新方法、 屬性和事件其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>網頁開發人員和其他呼叫端的控制項:-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A>方法-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>屬性-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A>屬性-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>事件-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>事件 # # 插入資料 ObjectDataSourceView 物件支援插入新的資料列，藉由呼叫商務或資料物件的方法，由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertMethod%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls that automatically perform inserts, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, pass their parameters in an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface to the ObjectDataSourceView and the view object merges these parameters with any parameters that are found in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項的自動執行，例如插入、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>，其參數中的傳遞<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>ObjectDataSourceView 並檢視物件的介面會合併這些參數中所找到的任何參數與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following insert methods, properties, and events are implemented by the ObjectDataSourceView and exposed directly by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control to page developers and other callers: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> method - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> property - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting> event - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted> event ## Deleting Data The ObjectDataSourceView object supports deleting data by calling a business or data object method that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列插入方法、 屬性和事件都由 ObjectDataSourceView 實作直接以公開其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>網頁開發人員和其他呼叫端的控制項:-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>方法-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>屬性-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>屬性-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>事件-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>事件 # # 刪除資料 ObjectDataSourceView 物件呼叫由商務或資料物件方法來刪除資料的支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls that automatically perform deletes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, pass their parameters in an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface to the ObjectDataSourceView and the view object merges these parameters with any parameters that are found in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項的自動執行刪除，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>，其參數中的傳遞<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>ObjectDataSourceView 並檢視物件的介面會合併這些參數中所找到的任何參數與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteParameters%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteParameters%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following delete methods, properties, and events are implemented by the ObjectDataSourceView and exposed directly by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control to page developers and other callers: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> method - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> property - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> event ## Filtering and Sorting Data Data retrieval is more powerful when you can filter the data dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 下列刪除方法、 屬性和事件都由 ObjectDataSourceView 實作直接以公開其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>網頁開發人員和其他呼叫端的控制項:-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>方法-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>屬性-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>屬性-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>事件-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>事件 # # 篩選和排序資料的資料擷取是更為強大時您可以動態篩選的資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Filtering is supported only by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> or <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: 篩選為僅支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Data.DataTable>或<xref:System.Data.DataSet>物件。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> properties to apply dynamic filtering to data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A>屬性以套用動態篩選，來擷取資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties are implemented by the ObjectDataSourceView object and exposed directly by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control to data-bound controls and other callers.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性 ObjectDataSourceView 物件實作，直接以公開其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項資料繫結控制項和其他呼叫端。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You can sort the data that you retrieve with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> by ordering the data in memory after it is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 您可以排序的資料，您使用擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>所擷取後，在記憶體中排序資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Sorting is supported only by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> or <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 支援排序只有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Data.DataTable>或<xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.CanSort%2A> property always returns `true`, because the ObjectDataSourceView cannot determine what type is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> method without calling the method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.CanSort%2A>屬性一律會傳回`true`，因為 ObjectDataSourceView 無法判斷何種類型由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法，而不需要呼叫方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.CanSort%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> property syntax is the same as for a <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>屬性語法是一樣<xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: Tracking View State The ObjectDataSourceView implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤檢視狀態 ObjectDataSourceView 實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>介面並使用檢視狀態來追蹤其狀態在頁面的要求。</xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>

trans-unit.source: Implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.LoadViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SaveViewState%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.TrackViewState%2A> methods are provided to enable view state tracking for the control.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.LoadViewState%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SaveViewState%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.TrackViewState%2A>方法可供啟用控制項檢視狀態的追蹤。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.TrackViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.LoadViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> constructor is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.GetView%2A> method to return a new instance of a data source view with the specified `viewName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>建構函式會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.GetView%2A>方法以傳回具有指定的資料來源檢視的新執行個體`viewName`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.GetView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is associated with only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> at any time, and always names the view `DefaultView`, although this naming restriction is imposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, not the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>.

trans-unit.target: CanRetrieveTotalRowCount 屬性會傳回`true`，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectCountMethod%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectCountMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method that returns the count should return the total number of rows that can be paged, not the number of rows in a page.
trans-unit.target: 方法會傳回計數應該傳回的資料列總數的可以分頁不在頁面中的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the total number of rows that can be paged to determine how to render paging controls.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項使用可以分頁來決定如何呈現分頁控制項的資料列的總數。

trans-unit.source: For example, how many numeric pager buttons to render in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control pager.

trans-unit.source: The CanRetrieveTotalRowCount property is checked during a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> method to ensure that the data source control supports all capabilities requested by setting the various <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫期間檢查 CanRetrieveTotalRowCount 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>方法，以確保您的資料來源控制項支援所設定的各種要求的所有功能<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control supports a sorted view on the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView"></xref>目前相關聯的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>控制項支援基礎資料來源的排序的檢視。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control only supports sorting data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataView>, or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object, the view object cannot determine whether sorting is supported until the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> method is called and returns.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>排序資料的支援時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Data.DataSet>， <xref:System.Data.DataView>，或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件時，檢視物件無法判斷是否支援排序直到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法呼叫，並傳回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the CanSort property always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，CanSort 屬性一律會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: CanUpdate 屬性會傳回`true`，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateMethod%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: Updating is not supported if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateMethod*> property is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 不支援更新如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateMethod*>屬性為空字串 ("")。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateMethod*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control performs updates and deletes when data in a row in the underlying data storage changes during the time of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會決定如何<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>控制項執行更新和刪除作業的時間期間的基礎資料存放區中的資料列中的資料變更時。

trans-unit.source: The ConflictDetection property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the `Update` method.
trans-unit.target: ConflictDetection 屬性可讓您決定是否要將舊的和新值的參數套用至`Update`方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectMethod%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object with the columns `Name` and `Number`, and the ConflictDetection property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions> value, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果該方法是由指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectMethod%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件與資料行`Name`和`Number`，和 ConflictDetection 屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions>值的建立參數`Name`和`Number`如`Update`方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the ConflictDetection property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions> value, parameters are created with the names `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Name`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ConflictDetection 屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions>值的名稱建立參數`Name`， `Number`， `original_Name`，和`original_Name`。</xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions>

trans-unit.source: (The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>.) The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> then determines if the method that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateMethod%2A> property has parameters that match.
trans-unit.target: (取決於原始值參數的完整名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>。)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>然後會判斷如果的方法，是在指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateMethod%2A>屬性具有相符的參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Concurrency control is a technique data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data.
trans-unit.target: 並行存取控制是資料存放區使用的控制如何讀取和多個用戶端存取和管理相同的資料時，存放區中變更資料的技術。

trans-unit.source: For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data, and presents it to a different user.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一個用戶端讀取資料並呈現給使用者，而另一個用戶端讀取相同的資料，並提供給不同的使用者。

trans-unit.source: If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, some unexpected result might occur, because both clients might update different values for the same data.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個使用者更新的資料，並送出至資料存放區，無法預料的結果可能會發生，因為兩個用戶端可能會更新為相同的資料不同的值。

trans-unit.source: This is considered a conflict.
trans-unit.target: 這被視為衝突。

trans-unit.source: By setting the ConflictDetection property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions> value, the `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them, as necessary.
trans-unit.target: ConflictDetection 屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions>值`Update`方法可以再比較舊的和新值給原始資料來源來偵測衝突，以及處理它們，視。</xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions>

trans-unit.source: The value of the ConflictDetection property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 屬性是 ConflictDetection 值儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 選取的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> values that are passed to an update, insert, or delete operation are automatically converted from <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to the <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>值傳遞給更新、 插入或刪除作業會自動轉換從<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>至<xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Not converting `null` to the <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> value can result in errors at run time.
trans-unit.target: 不會將轉換`null`至<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>值會在執行階段發生錯誤。</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the ConvertNullToDBNull property to indicate whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> values that are passed to an update, insert, or a delete operation are automatically converted from `null` to the <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ConvertNullToDBNull 屬性來表示是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>值傳遞給更新、 插入或刪除作業會自動轉換從`null`至<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConvertNullToDBNull?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConvertNullToDBNull?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConvertNullToDBNull?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of a class that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control uses for a parameter in a data operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定類別的名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>控制項所使用的資料作業中的參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control uses the specified class instead of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> objects that are in the various parameters collections.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref>控制項使用指定的類別，而不是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>各種不同的參數集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Instead of specifying several parameters that are passed to the `Select`, `Update`, `Insert`, and `Delete` methods, you can create one object that aggregates several items.
trans-unit.target: 而不是指定數個參數傳遞給`Select`， `Update`， `Insert`，和`Delete`方法，您可以建立數個項目會彙總的一個物件。

trans-unit.source: This one object is passed to the methods, instead of several parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這一個物件會傳遞至方法，而不是數個參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A partially or fully qualified class name that identifies the type of the object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> can use as a parameter for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update*>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete*> operation.
trans-unit.target: 識別的物件類型的部分或完整限定的類別名稱， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref>可用的參數為<> *>， <> </> *>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete*>作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Performs a delete operation by calling the business object method that is identified by the property using the specified keys and oldValues collections.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫由商務物件方法來執行刪除作業使用指定的屬性 keys 和 oldValues 集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which means that an unknown number of rows were deleted.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為-1，表示已刪除資料列數目未知。

trans-unit.source: To return a different value, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳回不同的值，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of affected rows is typically returned by the `Delete` method for the business object, and that value is available from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> parameter of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 受影響的資料列數目通常由`Delete`方法商務物件，而該值是可從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Delete method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A> method, passing the `keys` and `oldValues` collections.
trans-unit.target: Delete 方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A>方法，傳遞`keys`和`oldValues`集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the key values used to identify the item to delete.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>用來識別要刪除的項目索引鍵值。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: These parameters are used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod*> property to perform the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用這些參數與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod*>屬性來執行刪除作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod*>

trans-unit.source: If there are no parameters associated with the method, pass <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有相關聯的方法沒有參數，傳遞<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the additional non-key values used to match the item in the data source.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含額外的非索引鍵值用來比對資料來源中的項目。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Row values are passed to the method only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection*> property is set to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions"></xref> field.
trans-unit.target: 資料列的值會傳遞至方法才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection*>屬性設定為<xref href="System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions"></xref>欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection*>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows deleted; otherwise, -1, if the number is not known.
trans-unit.target: 刪除; 的資料列數目否則為-1，如果數目不明。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete*> operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete*>作業已完成。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete*>

trans-unit.source: Handle the Deleted event to examine the values of a return value and output parameters or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A> operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 處理刪除事件，檢查傳回值的值和輸出參數，或要判定是否擲回例外狀況之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A>作業已完成。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object that is associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，輸出參數和例外狀況處理屬性都是從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>與事件相關聯的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView"></xref> object invokes to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的方法或函式名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView"></xref>刪除資料的物件會叫用。

trans-unit.source: The method that is identified by the DeleteMethod property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method.
trans-unit.target: DeleteMethod 屬性所識別的方法可以是執行個體方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。

trans-unit.source: If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the DeleteMethod property is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果是執行個體方法，會建立商務物件，並終結每次呼叫 DeleteMethod 屬性所指定的方法時。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreated> event to work with the business object before the method specified by the DeleteMethod property is called.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreated>DeleteMethod 屬性所指定的方法呼叫之前使用商務物件的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreated>

trans-unit.source: You can also handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectDisposing> event that is raised after the method specified by the DeleteMethod property is called.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectDisposing>DeleteMethod 屬性所指定的方法呼叫之後，就會引發的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectDisposing>

trans-unit.source: If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events.
trans-unit.target: 如果該方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，不會建立商務物件，而且您無法處理這些事件。

trans-unit.source: If the business object that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control works with implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果商務物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項搭配實作一個以上的方法或函式具有相同名稱 （方法多載），資料來源控制項嘗試叫用正確的其中一個，根據一組條件，包括中的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteParameters%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteParameters%2A> collection do not match those of the DeleteMethod method signature, the data source throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果在參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteParameters%2A>集合不相符的 DeleteMethod 方法簽章，資料來源擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the DeleteMethod property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: DeleteMethod 屬性的值儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView"></xref> uses to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表方法的名稱，或函式， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView"> </xref>使用刪除資料。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod*> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得參數集合，其中包含所使用的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod*>

trans-unit.source: The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the DeleteParameters collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the method specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod%2A> property signature.
trans-unit.target: 名稱和 DeleteParameters 集合中所包含的參數類型必須符合的名稱和型別之參數所指定的方法中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod%2A>屬性簽章。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parameter names are affected by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property and are case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱會受到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>屬性且區分大小寫。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with those parameters that are provided by the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的參數，例如資料繫結控制項時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項自動合併使用這些資料繫結控制項所提供的參數集合中已明確指定任何參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> that contains the parameters used by the method specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含所指定的方法所使用的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete*> operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete*>作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete*>

trans-unit.source: Handle the Deleting event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control performs the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: 處理刪除事件，以執行額外的初始化作業專屬於您的應用程式，來驗證參數的值，或若要變更參數值之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>，控制項執行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A>作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The parameters are available as an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection that is accessed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> property, which is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 參數是可做為<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>所存取的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A>屬性，由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data source control supports paging through the set of data that it retrieves.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料來源控制項是否支援，它會擷取的資料集進行分頁。

trans-unit.source: Paging by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> control is handled by setting the EnablePaging, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectCountMethod%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> and defining a `Select` method in the business object with the proper parameters.
trans-unit.target: 分頁所<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>控制項由設定 EnablePaging <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectCountMethod%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>並定義`Select`中使用適當參數的商務物件方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectCountMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: When the EnablePaging property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectParameters%2A> collection includes two additional parameters for the first row requested and the number of rows requested.
trans-unit.target: 當 EnablePaging 屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectParameters%2A>集合包含兩個額外的參數，要求的第一個資料列和要求的資料列數目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: These two parameters are named as defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個參數的命名方式所定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `Select` method should return the requested number of rows starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: `Select`方法應傳回所要求的指定索引處開始的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Because the data might not divide evenly by the page size, the last page might contain fewer rows.
trans-unit.target: 因為資料可能不完整地分配依頁面大小，最後一頁可能會包含較少的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Thus, the number of rows requested is actually the maximum number of rows that are returned.
trans-unit.target: 因此，要求的資料列數目是實際上會傳回的資料列的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> property is checked during a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> method to ensure that the data source control supports all capabilities requested by setting the various <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>呼叫期間檢查屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>方法，以確保您的資料來源控制項支援所設定的各種要求的所有功能<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled on the associated data-bound control, the data-bound control calls the `Select` method with the start index and number of rows that are required.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項相關聯的資料繫結控制項上啟用分頁時，呼叫`Select`方法的起始索引和所需的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectCountMethod%2A> property is set, the data-bound control calls the method before rendering the pager controls.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectCountMethod%2A>屬性設定，將資料繫結控制項之前呈現頁面巡覽區控制項，呼叫的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectCountMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has paging enabled with a page size of 5, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectCountMethod%2A> method returns 20, only 4 pages are displayed in the pager.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項具有分頁已啟用頁面大小為 5，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectCountMethod%2A>方法會傳回 20，只有 4 個頁面都會顯示在頁面巡覽區。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectCountMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The value of the EnablePaging property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 屬性是 EnablePaging 值儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the data source control supports paging through the data it retrieves; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料來源控制項支援的資料進行分頁它擷取。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Performs a delete operation using the method and the specified keys and oldValues collection.
trans-unit.target: 執行 delete 作業使用方法，並指定 keys 和 oldValues 集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> class implements the inherited ExecuteDelete method to delete data from an underlying data store using a business object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>類別會實作繼承的 ExecuteDelete 方法可從使用商務物件的基礎資料存放區刪除資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the ExecuteDelete method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員和資料繫結控制項作者不 ExecuteDelete 方法會直接呼叫。請改用公開<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the delete operation is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Deleting> event.
trans-unit.target: 執行刪除作業之前，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A>呼叫方法來引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Deleting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Deleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and perform any preprocessing before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理此事件，以檢查參數的值，並執行任何前置處理之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform a delete operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> uses reflection to call the method that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod%2A> property and any associated parameters in the `keys` and `oldValues` collections, and then executes it.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行刪除作業<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>使用反映以呼叫的方法，由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod%2A>屬性，以及任何相關的參數在`keys`和`oldValues`集合，然後執行它。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: After the operation completes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Deleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 在作業完成之後，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A>呼叫方法來引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Deleted>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Deleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> class implements the inherited ExecuteSelect method to retrieve data using a business object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>類別會實作繼承的可用方法，來擷取使用商務物件資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the ExecuteSelect method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員和資料繫結控制項作者不可用方法會直接呼叫。請改用公開<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The specified method can have any method signature, but must return one of the types for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control that are listed in the following table to call it successfully.
trans-unit.target: 指定的方法可以有任何方法簽章，但是必須傳回類型的其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>能夠成功呼叫其下表中列出的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: |Return type|Action| |-----------------|------------| |<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>|The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.| |<xref:System.Data.DataTable>|A <xref:System.Data.DataView> is created using the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.| |<xref:System.Data.DataSet>|The first <xref:System.Data.DataTable> of the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> is extracted and a <xref:System.Data.DataView> is created and returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.| |<xref:System.Object>|The object is wrapped in a one-element <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> and returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.| Before the data retrieval is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: |傳回型別 |動作 | |-----------------|------------| |<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法所傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>。 | |<xref:System.Data.DataTable>|建立使用<xref:System.Data.DataTable>並<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法所傳回<xref:System.Data.DataView>。 | |<xref:System.Data.DataSet>|擷取第一個<xref:System.Data.DataTable><xref:System.Data.DataSet>並建立及<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法所傳回<xref:System.Data.DataView>。 | |<xref:System.Object>|物件是包裝在一個元素<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法所傳回。 | 執行資料擷取之前，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>呼叫方法來引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Selecting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Selecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Data.DataView></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataView></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A></xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object and caching is enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Data.DataSet>物件和快取已啟用，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>擷取的資料，並在作業期間，將資料儲存至快取。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 快取，已捨棄，或重新整理會根據建立指定之組合的快取行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> property has been specified, it is evaluated along with any supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Data.DataSet>物件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>指定屬性，它會評估與提供所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A>屬性和結果篩選條件會套用到期間資料清單<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> class implements the inherited ExecuteUpdate method to update data using a business object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>類別會實作繼承的 ExecuteUpdate 方法來更新使用商務物件資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the ExecuteUpdate method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員和資料繫結控制項作者不 ExecuteUpdate 方法會直接呼叫。請改用公開<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The values that are contained in the `keys` and `values` collections are evaluated and merged with any values that are contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 中所包含的值`keys`和`values`集合會評估並與包含的任何值合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateParameters%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.UpdateParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions> value, the values that are contained in the `oldValues` collection are formatted with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property and are also merged.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the business object method that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectMethod*> property is called.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定商務物件方法時套用的篩選運算式所識別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectMethod*>屬性稱為。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.SelectMethod*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control supports filtering data only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataView>, or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項支援篩選的資料時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Data.DataSet>， <xref:System.Data.DataView>，或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The syntax that is used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property is a format string-style expression.
trans-unit.target: 用於語法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>屬性是格式字串樣式的運算式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> property because the filter expression is applied to the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataView> object that is returned from executing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 篩選運算式語法是相同的語法可接受的<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>屬性因為篩選運算式會套用至<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>屬性<xref:System.Data.DataView>傳回從執行物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: (For more information, see <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>.) If you add parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection, you can also include format string placeholders, for example `"{0}"`, in the expression to substitute for parameter values.
trans-unit.target: (如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>。)</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>如果您加入參數，以便<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合，您可以也包含格式字串的預留位置，例如`"{0}"`，在替換參數值的運算式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 根據中的參數索引來取代預留位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can include parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>包含參數

trans-unit.source: If the type of the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果參數類型是字串或字元類型，請使用單引號括住參數。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks are not needed if the parameter is a numeric type.The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders found in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果參數是數值類型，則不需要引號。<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合包含的參數，會評估<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>中找到的預留位置</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the FilterExpression property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: FilterExpression 屬性的值儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > It is recommended that you validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 建議您驗證您從用戶端接收任何篩選參數值。

trans-unit.source: The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the <xref:System.Data.DataView> object that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段只會取代篩選條件運算式的參數值並將其以套用<xref:System.Data.DataView>所傳回的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView"></xref> object invokes to insert data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的方法或函式名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView"></xref>插入資料的物件會叫用。

trans-unit.source: The method that is identified by the InsertMethod property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method.
trans-unit.target: InsertMethod 屬性所識別的方法可以是執行個體方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。

trans-unit.source: If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the InsertMethod property is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果是執行個體方法，會建立商務物件，並終結每次呼叫 InsertMethod 屬性所指定的方法時。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreated> event to work with the business object before the method specified by the InsertMethod property is called.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreated>InsertMethod 屬性所指定的方法呼叫之前使用商務物件的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreated>

trans-unit.source: You can also handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectDisposing> event that is raised after the method specified by the InsertMethod property is called.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectDisposing>InsertMethod 屬性所指定的方法呼叫之後，就會引發的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectDisposing>

trans-unit.source: (`Dispose` is called, only if the business object implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.) If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events.
trans-unit.target: (`Dispose`呼叫時，只有當商務物件會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。)</xref:System.IDisposable>如果該方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，不會建立商務物件，而且您無法處理這些事件。

trans-unit.source: If the business object that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果商務物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>物件實作一個以上的方法或函式具有相同名稱 （方法多載），資料來源控制項嘗試叫用正確的其中一個，根據一組條件，包括中的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A> collection do not match those of the method specified by the InsertMethod property signature, the data source throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果在參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A>集合不符合的指定 InsertMethod 屬性簽章的方法、 資料來源擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the InsertParameters collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the method specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertMethod%2A> property signature.
trans-unit.target: 名稱和 InsertParameters 集合中所包含的參數類型必須符合的名稱和型別之參數所指定的方法中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertMethod%2A>屬性簽章。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with those parameters that are provided by the data-bound control.

trans-unit.target: 處理明確地呼叫另一個建構函式，並將結果儲存至物件的執行個體的 ObjectCreating 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>屬性相關聯的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the ObjectDisposing event to call other methods on the object and set properties or to perform clean-up that is specific to the object before the object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 處理 ObjectDisposing 事件物件上呼叫其他方法，並設定屬性，或執行清理之前終結物件的特定物件。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a format string to apply to the names of the parameters for original values that are passed to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Delete" name="Delete" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""></xref> methods.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要套用至傳遞給的原始值的參數名稱的格式字串<xref uid="langword_csharp_Delete" name="Delete" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""></xref>方法。

trans-unit.source: The OldValuesParameterFormatString format string is applied to primary keys only, such as those that are identified with the `DataKeyNames` property of a data-bound control or in delete and update scenarios, where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions> value and the set of original values that are passed to the corresponding data method.
trans-unit.target: 參數格式字串套用至主索引鍵，例如識別與`DataKeyNames`或 delete 中的資料繫結控制項的屬性，並更新案例中，其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions>值和一組會傳遞至相對應的資料方法的原始值。</xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Two common scenarios where you might change the OldValuesParameterFormatString property are as follows: - To differentiate between old and new values in updates.
trans-unit.target: 您可能會在此變更的參數屬性的兩個常見的案例如下:-若要在區別在更新舊的和新值。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions> value, parameters for both the original and new values are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions>值參數的原始和新的值都會加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Without the formatting string, two parameters with the same name would be created for each data field.
trans-unit.target: 而格式化的字串，不會為每個資料欄位建立具有相同名稱的兩個參數。

trans-unit.source: By changing the name of the original value parameter, you can compare the data to the original data source to detect conflicts and compare key values.
trans-unit.target: 藉由變更原始值參數的名稱，您可以比較原始資料來源偵測衝突，並比較索引鍵值的資料。

trans-unit.source: - Some visual designers implement a particular naming scheme for original values and keys.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a format string applied to the names of any oldValues passed to the or method.
